title: User Account Details

xdm:userAccount.description: Loyalty details, preferences, login processes, and other account preferences.

xdm:ID.title: ID
xdm:ID.description: Captures the user account ID. This field could be used to collect data that may be considered to be sensitive or personal. Visit: https://www.adobe.com/go/xdm-spi-and-pii for more information.

xdm:contactDetails.title: Contact Details
xdm:contactDetails.description: Extension of the Personal Profile data type.

xdm:startDate.title: Start Date
xdm:startDate.description: Date when the account was opened. This field could be used to collect data that may be considered to be sensitive or personal. Visit: https://www.adobe.com/go/xdm-spi-and-pii for more information.

xdm:status.title: Status
xdm:status.description: This should describe the current status of the account

xdm:accountType.title: Account Type
xdm:accountType.description: Captures the user account type, if applicable. This field could be used to collect data that may be considered to be sensitive or personal. Visit: https://www.adobe.com/go/xdm-spi-and-pii for more information.

xdm:productPreferences.title: Product Preferences
xdm:productPreferences.description: Product, shopping, or experience preferences such as gender, color pref, seat/aisle, king/double bed, etc.

xdm:alertStatus.title: Alert Status
xdm:alertStatus.description: Captures whether or not alerts have been enabled for the account.

xdm:autopayStatus.title: Autopay Status
xdm:autopayStatus.description: Captures whether or not the account has been enrolled in autopay.
